div.p: The R.E.C. in combination with private donors has organized a food distribution with a focus on the needs of the whole family. There will be chicken soup, hotdogs, groceries, and a special focus on baby and toddler needs; diapers, wipes, Read More …

div.p: Selinsgrove Area School District has been honored with the Best Communities for Music Education designation from The NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education. Now in its 21st year, the Best Communities for Music Education designation is awarded Read More …

div.p: The announcement by the governor of school building closure for the remainder of the academic year has a significant impact on all facets of our educational system. It means that we will continue with distance learning for all of our Read More …

div.p: Selinsgrove Area School District prohibits discrimination, including sexual harassment, on the basis of race, color, age, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, ancestry, national origin, marital status, parenting status, pregnancy or handicap/disability in its activities, programs or employment practices. Inquiries concerning nondiscrimination should be sent to Mr. Jeffrey Hummel, 329 Seals Avenue, Selinsgrove, PA 17870. The Selinsgrove Area School District is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Auxiliary aids and services are available upon request.

div.p: In accordance with Governor Wolf’s decision, the Selinsgrove Area School District will be closed for the remainder of the academic year. Please continue to communicate any needs regarding our distance learning approach.
